title: Database server in dev mode does not persist data
body:
### Describe the bug

I used hibernate reactive with panache to create a record to the [database dev service](https://quarkus.io/guides/databases-dev-services). After that, I try to get that record again but it's cannot found that. I checked the database and it's blank.

### Expected behavior

Can persist data

### Actual behavior

The data is not persist

### How to Reproduce?

I created the repo to reproduce it https://github.com/kingtran2112/quarkus-reactive-database
1. Send grpc request to create a product. It will return an id in the response.
2. Using the id above to get the product again.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Kings-MacBook-Pro.local 21.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.4.0: Fri Mar 18 00:45:05 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.101.4~15/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.4" 2022-07-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Homebrew (build 17.0.4+0) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Homebrew (build 17.0.4+0, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.11.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.4.2

### Additional information

_No response_
